properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 9 at 11:44AM CST until January 14 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The Flood Advisory continues for portions of the Mississippi River...
Mississippi River at Tiptonville affecting New Madrid...Pemiscot
and Lake Counties
Mississippi River at Osceola affecting Mississippi...Lauderdale
and Tipton Counties
Mississippi River at Tunica Riverpark affecting Lee and Tunica
Counties

The Flood Advisory continues for
the Mississippi River at Tunica Riverpark
* until Tuesday January 14.
* At 10 AM Thursday the stage was 39.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 41.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will remain steady for the next few days.
* At 39.0 feet...In Mississippi, the river is touching the levee at
many places near Mhoon Landing. Road to Stubb's Island is closed.
Fields are flooding inside the levee west of Seabrook Road. Water
has reached the outlet of McKinney Bayou Pumping Station.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued Friday or sooner if conditions
warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
